articles.title: Former Guinea dictator Camara escapes from prison in jailbreak, justice minister says - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Gunmen stormed the main prison in Guinea's capital early Saturday and freed former dictator Moussa “Dadis” Camara, the country's justice minister said, announcing the closure of the West African nation's borders.
